attributes.action: Provide more funding for small local voluntary organisations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The local volutary organisations do great work in the local community yet funding is getting harder and harder to get hold of. The money seems to always go to Larger charities. Lots of the locally based organisations who are best placed to deliver services the local people need and want are going under because of lack of money available.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
